          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy stored in food</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie gespeichert in der Nahrung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie enregistrée en nourriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia armazenada no alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia memorizzata in alimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια που καταχωρείται στα τρόφιμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía salvada en alimento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar graph compares the amount of energy stored in a gram of rice, nuts, potato, bread, cabbage and carrot.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cabbage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carrot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bread</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">food</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">potato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rice</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm vergleicht die Menge von 
Energie gespeichert in einem Gramm des Reises, der Muttern, der 
Kartoffel, des Brotes, des Kohls und der Karotte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres compare la quantité 
d'énergie enregistrée en gramme de riz, des écrous, de la pomme de 
terre, du pain, du chou et de la carotte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico de barra compara a quantidade de 
energia armazenada em um grama do arroz, das porcas, da batata, do 
pão, do repolho e da cenoura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico a strisce confronta la quantità 
di energia memorizzata in un grammo di riso, dei dadi, della patata, 
del pane, del cavolo e della carota.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση ράβδων συγκρίνει το ποσό 
ενέργειας που καταχωρείται σε ένα γραμμάριο ρυζιού, καρυδιών, 
πατάτας, ψωμιού, λάχανου και καρότου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico de barra compara la cantidad de 
energía salvada en un gramo del arroz, de tuercas, de la patata, del 
pan, de la col y de la zanahoria.</string>
          </description>
